title: Understanding Tidal Phenomena and Scientific Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic earth science concepts and general understanding of lunar/solar influences
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, social phenomenon analysis through project collaboration

learning_goals: Students can explain three or more physical causes of tidal phenomena
Learners can apply differences based on tidal cycles (12-hour standard) and regional characteristics to predictive models
Learners can identify and critique five or more alternative conceptions of peer learners through open-ended survey analysis
Learners can write case-based project reports using tidal prediction simulation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
